All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Angle
A class representing an angle.
AngleType
This class defines an enum type that represents the different types of angles.
Axis
Enum representing the X and Y axes.
Circle
Represents a circle in a two-dimensional plane.
ControlController
A class that controls a ControlPanel.
ControlPanel
 
Coordinates
Coordinates is a class that provides methods for transforming and reverting coordinates.
Ellipsis
Represents Ellipsis in a two-dimensional plane.
Fresco
Fresco is a class that maintains a collection of images and their corresponding locations.
FrescoController
A class that controls a FrescoPanel.
FrescoPanel
This class represents a panel that displays a Fresco object.
IAxialSymmetry
Interface for objects that can be symmetrical along an axis.
ICentralSymmetry
Interface for objects that can be symmetrical about a central point.
IDrawable
Interface for objects that can be drawn to a Graphics object.
IHomothethy
Interface for objects that can be transformed by homothety.
Image
This class represents an image.
ImageController
The ImageController class is a MouseListener and MouseMotionListener for ImagePanel objects.
ImagePanel
Represents a panel that displays an image.
IRotation
Interface for objects that can be rotated.
ITranslation
Interface for objects that can be translated.
JFrameUtils
Provides utility methods for working with JFrame objects.
JTableShape
 
Line
Represents a line in a two-dimensional plane.
Main
 
ModelShape
 
Point
Represents a point on a two-dimensional plane.
Polygon
Represents a polygon on a two-dimensional plane.
Shape<T extends Shape<T>>
Represents a shape in a two-dimensional plane.
ShapeFactory
 
ShapeRenderer
 
ZinraphilController
This class is a controller for the ZinraphilFrame class.
ZinraphilFrame
